content: depending on your preference and add a custom tag if you like **measurements** finished width folded 5 7 5 cm / 2 3 inches finished circumference stretched 32 40 cm / 12 75 16 inches **gauge** 20 stitches and 28 rounds = 10 cm / 4 inches over stockinette in the round with yarn held together **material** yarn 55 103 m / 60 113 yds of holst garn supersoft 287 m/50 g 50% untreated merino wool and 50% untreated shetland wool 55 103 m / 60 113 yds of holst garn coast 350 m/ 50 g 55% merino lambswool and 45% cotton i recommend using fingering weight or other similar weight yarn needle i used a 5 mm / us 8 mini circular needle 15 cm / 6 inches in length please use the needle size that gets the right gauge feel free to use double-pointed needles mini circulars or the magic loop method crochet suggested size is 5 mm / h us crochet terminology tapestry needle use a medium size needle notions markers and scissors elastic i used classic hair elastic of 19 24 cm / 7 5 9 5 inches in circumference tag custom tag studio s etsy use sewing thread to sew in the tag *this pattern was tech-edited by heather folkner *
